Centuries after his demise at the hands of his own people, the forgotten king stalks the hallways he once ruled, riddled by tattered memories of a once-blessed life.

The moment he turns his haunted gaze upon you, it is already too late. Run. 👑⚔

Artists & Creatives, there's a browser plugin to remove AI sites from your search results. (Good for getting real references.)

Get the plugin here: iorate.github.io/ublacklist/d...
Then add the AI blocklists here: iorate.github.io/ublacklist/s...

🌺Token Commissions🌺
email: jawscommission@gmail.com
200USD - includes one revision.
No visual ref: 50 USD fee.
10 spots. Not first come first serve.
Will draw: Humanoids, furries, stylized real people.
Will not draw: Mecha/Mechanical lineages, realism, children.

Shares appreciated, thank you🌺
Quick portrait of my boy, Fi :3 I realized I’d never drawn him with his teeth showing!! #dndart

Also: 

Nadia Shammas is a 🇵🇸 Palestinian-American author who wrote the comic, SQUIRE. 

It’s about a girl proving herself within the empire that colonized her ppl, learning to love her heritage, and deconstructing her place in an oppressive system.

It’s really good.

bookshop.org/a/98494/9780...

Half a study and half wanting to draw BG3!Erik's back scar. It also extends to the upper corner of his right pec and about a quarter down his left butt cheek.
(Jeans because the brainrot is ModernAU flavored)

Just so you're informed, he has no idea how bad it looks and never has. 

#croquisdennui 🌩️

Write your senators today and tell them to call for permanent ceasefire.

There’s a template here that searches for the reps local to you and drafts a fully customizable letter that you can send. I’ve used this site many times and can vouch for its legitimacy:

fcnl.quorum.us/campaign/253...

Today I bring you character art for your TTRPG needs!

18 portraits to illustrate any NPC or PC you want in your home games. Info below!

please, for the love of christ, help out and support and showcase your fellow artists so that we’re not all balancing on a single knife when shit goes wrong. burn the part of you that’s trapped in capitalist toxic individualism. your peers are not competition.

So we're trying out a Bluesky indie art market! I'm going to make a flyer/instructions when I'm home later, but for now let's beta test: Indie artists/crafters/etc, skeet what you're selling with pics/links/etc and include #bsnm to share your wares in the market. Shoppers, add the feed ⬇️ to browse!

Thank you for the opportunity and congrats on 600 followers! Here's my evil sexy bastard rogue, Lucien; my sad but kind paladin Pietas; my absolutely sopping wet miserable definitely-not-a-vampire man Etienne; and my very sweet first D&D character Cyril, who makes excellent soup.

Thank you so much for all the new followers!! 🥺 Your support makes it less scary if Xitter goes to the... well.

Hello!
I am Leslie, a DnD lover who does digital art. My main focus lays on character and item design, as well as in illustrations.
I love drawing my OCs, telling story and draw items that look way to edible.

I am a digital illustrator looking for work specifically in book covers, actual play content, and general ttrpg work! (I'd LOVE to work with a romance author)
